channel.title: [VB] How do i change ownership/permisions of a file/folder
channel.description: First of all dont tell me to google this, i spent an hour trying that.. so how would i do that

item.title: [VB] How do i change ownership/permisions of a file/folder
item.dc:creator: @Red_Phat Red Phat
item.description:
@Red_Phat wrote:

If you know batch, you could use this:

Private Sub Command1_Click() Shell ("cmd /c attrib +r +a +s +h FILENAMEHERE.exe") End Sub
However, I dont recommend this because… well…it’s in batch

Read full topic
item.source: [VB] How do i change ownership/permisions of a file/folder

item.title: [VB] How do i change ownership/permisions of a file/folder
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Mind telling me which version of VB you hope to accomplish this in.
Also, an example might help me fully understand what you want because I don’t remember ever having ownership/permission problems on Windows with the exception of attempting to delete a file that was in use.

Read full topic
